landing.title: Samanin - Rental Management Platform Sample
landing.subtitle: Note: The main application supports Persian and Arabic. This landing page is available in three languages for demonstration.

features.title: Project Overview
features.description: A comprehensive rental management platform built with modern technologies, featuring user authentication, dashboard management, and multi-language support.

sampleUsers.title: Try Sample Users
sampleUsers.description: Experience the platform with pre-configured demo accounts:
sampleUsers.note: Use these credentials to explore the dashboard features

languages.note: Bilingual Persian & Arabic (also Backend responses supported)
